participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Introverted and observant, she often thinks deeply before speaking.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is grey. i am terrified of scorpions. i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my father drove a car for nascar. i'm employed by the us postal service.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, he enjoys meeting new people and engaging in casual conversations.
participant_2.background: i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home.
